extendedInfo.description: âThe Blue Bookâ will impact your life as you get to know who Jesus is, and who you can be! Jesus wants to give you peace and joy, and be your best friend.But this great news is not just for you! As you get to know Jesus you will be able to use these studies to introduce Jesus to your friends. âThe Blue Bookâ will help you grow as a person and help you to grow your Church!All chapters are available in English, Japanese, Indonesian, Simple Chinese and Traditional Chinese.Below are some basic instructions for using the Blue Book App.NAVIGATIONTap the title to see the list of ChaptersSwipe through the chapters with your finger from left to right.Press Toggle Notes from the menu to shrink long notes for easy reading and lesson preparation. Press it again to restore the notes.FEEDBACKPlease send any bugs, requests or enquiries to:jlhresource@gmail.com
